short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emulate 4 types of colorblindness on your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The primary objective of ChromaCare is to raise awareness about color vision deficiency and provide practical solutions for individuals with this condition. The extension offers features to simulate various types of colorblindness and adjust web page colors accordingly, allowing users to experience web content more accurately.
ChromaCare offers the following key features:
- Color Vision Testing: Users can undergo a quick vision test through the ChromaCare website, which identifies any potential colorblindness type.
- Colorblindness Simulation: The extension provides options to simulate different types of colorblindness, including protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia, and achromatopsia.
- Color Adjustment: Users can apply color filters to web pages based on their specific type of colorblindness, ensuring better visibility and comprehension of content.
- Seamless Integration: ChromaCare integrates seamlessly into the Chrome browser, allowing users to access its functionality with ease.
